GSD.description:
btrfs: fix deadlock between quota disable and qgroup rescan worker

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.178 by commit 26b3901d20bf9da2c6a00cb1fb48932166f80a45. For more details please see the references link.
